title: Junior Engineer
description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a motivated Junior Engineer to join our team. As an entry-level engineer, you will assist in designing, developing, and testing solutions under the guidance of senior engineers. You will contribute to ongoing projects, help troubleshoot issues, and learn modern tools and technologies. This role is ideal for recent graduates who are eager to start their engineering career and grow in a collaborative environment.

Responsibilities:

Assist in the development, testing, and maintenance of software or systems.

Work closely with senior engineers to support project deliverables.

Perform basic debugging, documentation, and reporting tasks.

Learn and apply best practices in coding, testing, and deployment.

Stay open to continuous learning and skill development.

Qualifications:

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.

Strong problem-solving skills and eagerness to learn.

Basic knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, C++).

Good communication and teamwork skills.
